translation.en: You are actually getting faster than me.
translation.ja: 俺に勝てると思う？

translation.en: I'll race you right now.
translation.ja: 競走するか

translation.en: I'm sorry to ask you.
translation.ja: 私はまだ平気よ

translation.en: You've no energy left.
translation.ja: キツいんでしょ？

translation.en: I'm going to beat you.
translation.ja: 追いついたぞ

translation.en: I'll see you at school.
translation.ja: じゃあ 学校で

translation.en: - Bye. - Okay, bye.
translation.ja: じゃあ またね

translation.en: What are you doing up so early?
translation.ja: 随分 早起きね

translation.en: Seriously? You and Dad were fighting all night, and I heard him leave again this morning.
translation.ja: また一晩中 パパと ケンカしてたでしょ？

translation.en: I'm sorry, sweetheart.
translation.ja: ごめんね

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.ja: どこへ？

translation.en: I just need some time to myself. Go figure out a few things.
translation.ja: 少し一人になって 考えたいの

translation.en: Okay, fine. Whatever. Are you going to be back on Monday? Because I have a track meet on Tuesday and I need a ride.
translation.ja: 月曜には戻ってね 火曜は陸上競技会なの

translation.en: Your dad will be here.
translation.ja: パパがいる

translation.en: Right, Dad's never here.
translation.ja: いつも留守よ

translation.en: Well, now he will be.
translation.ja: これからは家にいる

translation.en: Why, what's going on?
translation.ja: どういうこと？

translation.en: Gran's going to move in for a little while.
translation.ja: おばあちゃんが家に来る

translation.en: Your dad and I talked about it, and we both think that's best right now.
translation.ja: パパも それが一番いいと

translation.en: Gran's moving in, what...
translation.ja: どういうこと？

translation.en: Is this for real?
translation.ja: 本気？

translation.en: You leaving us?
translation.ja: 出ていくの？

translation.en: I'm not going to be far, and as soon as I get settled, you'll all come join me.
translation.ja: 落ち着いたら呼び寄せる

translation.en: We'll join you where?
translation.ja: どこに？

translation.en: Because I'm not leaving from my senior year. I'm not going to leave all my friends just because you're sick of fighting with Dad.
translation.ja: 親のせいで転校して 友達と離れたくない

translation.en: I'm sorry, Abby.
translation.ja: ごめんね

translation.en: Were you even going to say goodbye?
translation.ja: 黙って行く気だった？

translation.en: I love you, sweetheart.
translation.ja: 愛してるわ

translation.en: Where's Mommy going?
translation.ja: ママ どこ行くの？

translation.en: Jess.
translation.ja: ジェス

translation.en: She's...
translation.ja: ママは…

translation.en: Come here. She won't be long. She's...
translation.ja: すぐに戻ってくるわ

translation.en: She won't be long. Do you want me to make you some breakfast?
translation.ja: すぐに戻ってくるわ 朝食を作ろうか？

translation.en: Don't lie to her.
translation.ja: ウソつかないで

translation.en: Bree.
translation.ja: ブリー

translation.en: Everything's going to be fine.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ

translation.en: No, it's not. Nothing's ever going to be fine again.
translation.ja: いいえ 大丈夫なんかじゃない

translation.en: Kevin.
translation.ja: ケビン

translation.en: Due to increases in the overseas third- quarter market contraction
translation.ja: 第３四半期の 海外市場の縮小で―

translation.en: the commodities markets took a tumble,
translation.ja: 商品相場が下落

translation.en: finishing up only ten points above last year's market record low.
translation.ja: 昨年の最安値からは 10ポイント上昇したのみ

translation.en: The treasury bills becoming more in demand due to European volatility.
translation.ja: ヨーロッパ市場の乱高下で 短期国債の需要が高まり

translation.en: The treasury department has suspended trading on ten- year T- Bills
translation.ja: ヨーロッパ市場の乱高下で 短期国債の需要が高まり 財務省は 取引を一時停止…

translation.en: - until opening of trading tomorrow. - Serina?
translation.ja: 財務省は 取引を一時停止… セリーナ？

translation.en: Serina?
translation.ja: セリーナ？

translation.en: Serina, it's 7:20, and you're not here. Can you please call me, and let me know that you're on your way?
translation.ja: もう７時20分よ こっちに向かってる？

translation.en: I've left checks for the girls' new school uniforms on the table,
translation.ja: 制服代の小切手は テーブルの上よ

translation.en: and their new backpacks are in the front hall closet.
translation.ja: 新しいカバンはクローゼット

translation.en: All right, thank you.
translation.ja: よろしくね

translation.en: Carrie? Caitlyn?
translation.ja: キャリー　ケイトリン

translation.en: Girls, time to wake up.
translation.ja: 起きる時間よ

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: さあ　起きて

translation.en: - Wake up. - Mom, it's summer.
translation.ja: ママ　夏休みだよ

translation.en: I know, but Serina's late, and I have an early work meeting. I'm going to have to drop you off at Daddy's.
translation.ja: セリーナが来ないから パパの家に連れてくわ

translation.en: But it's not Daddy's weekend.
translation.ja: パパの週じゃない

translation.en: Yes, I know. But I have a breakfast meeting before I go into work,
translation.ja: ママは朝から会議なの

translation.en: and these particular clients do not understand that people have personal lives.
translation.ja: 私生活を理解しない顧客とね

translation.en: Can't they come here?
translation.ja: ここに呼んだら？

translation.en: No. They cannot come here, honey.
translation.ja: ダメ　ここには呼べない

translation.en: Don't we have personal lives?
translation.ja: 私たちの私生活は？

translation.en: Yes, you have personal lives, so you go back to sleep
translation.ja: そうね　悪かったわ 寝てなさい お隣さんに子守を頼んでみる

translation.en: and I'll ask Mrs. Burnette next door if she will watch you until Serina gets here, okay?
translation.ja: 寝てなさい お隣さんに子守を頼んでみる

translation.en: Go to sleep.
translation.ja: 眠って

translation.en: A potential merger sounds promising, and I am inclined to recommend it to our clients,
translation.ja: 合併案は成功の見込みが ありますが―

translation.en: but I still think there are some issues we need to consider.
translation.ja: 懸案事項もあります

translation.en: Promising? It's a home run.
translation.ja: 見込み？ 成功は確実よ

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't understand why we're not fast- tracking.
translation.ja: 迅速に進めるべきです

translation.en: Playground is a stand- alone in the youth market. No one else is offering monitored interactive social space for teens and preteens.
translation.ja: プレイグラウンド社は 単独企業として成り立ってる

translation.en: Which is why this merger makes sense.
translation.ja: 吸収合併すれば―

translation.en: Playground gets to maintain the youth market while still having access to the--
translation.ja: 従来の若者市場に加えて…

translation.en: You know what? I have another meeting. Can we pick this up later?
translation.ja: 失礼　次の会議がある

translation.en: Abby, I'd really like to resolve this before Monday.
translation.ja: 月曜までに決めたいの

translation.en: Gabrielle, why don't we give her the weekend to dot her i's and cross her t's, okay?
translation.ja: ガブリエル　週末に じっくり検討してもらおう

translation.en: What are you drinking?
translation.ja: それは何だ？

translation.en: Kale, spinach, ginger, lemon juice.
translation.ja: ケールとホウレン草入りの ジュース

translation.en: - Is it worth it? - Haven't decided yet,
translation.ja: 健康的だな 効果は疑わしいわ

translation.en: - but I am leaning towards no. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 効果は疑わしいわ

translation.en: Good luck with that.
translation.ja: 頑張れよ

translation.en: Hey. This isn't about me, is it?
translation.ja: 私が提案した案件だから―

translation.en: Because I'm the one who brought the deal in?
translation.ja: 気に入らないの？

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: どうして？

translation.en: Because Wes and I are involved.
translation.ja: 私はウェスと付き合ってる

translation.en: No, of course not.
translation.ja: 関係ないわ

translation.en: I just don't want our personal relationship to affect what we do here.
translation.ja: 仕事に私情を 挟んでほしくないの

translation.en: You're dating my ex- husband. We don't have a personal relationship.
translation.ja: 別れた夫の交際相手に 興味ないわ

translation.en: - I just meant-- - No, I know what you meant.
translation.ja: でも… もうやめて

translation.en: It's your sister.
translation.ja: 妹さんです

translation.en: - Which one? - I didn't ask.
translation.ja: どっちの？ さあ… “生死に関わる問題”と

translation.en: She said it's a matter of life or death.
translation.ja: さあ… “生死に関わる問題”と

translation.en: That's Jess. Tell her I'll call her back.
translation.ja: ジェスだわ

translation.en: Hi, Jess.
translation.ja: なあに？ ジェス

translation.en: Abby, I need for you to come home.
translation.ja: アビー！ 家に帰ってきて

translation.en: Okay, I can't. Work is crazy right now.
translation.ja: 仕事が忙しいの

translation.en: - You never come home. - I was just home at Christmas.
translation.ja: お願い！ 年末に帰った

translation.en: That was like a million months ago, and I wouldn't even ask if it weren't a matter of life and death.
translation.ja: 何か月も前だし 生死に関わる問題なの

translation.en: - Is this about a guy? Because I... - No.
translation.ja: 男性の話なら… 違う！

translation.en: This is not about a guy. Why would you even ask that?
translation.ja: なぜそう思うの？

translation.en: I'm not a baby. This is an actual emergency of drastic importance...
translation.ja: 子供じゃないわ 深刻な…

translation.en: Wes.
translation.ja: ウェス

translation.en: I didn't want to disturb you at work.
translation.ja: 押しかけてすまない

translation.en: Now is not a good day. I have back- to- back meetings.
translation.ja: 今日は忙しいの

translation.en: Yes, I am familiar with your priorities.
translation.ja: 相変わらず 仕事第一か

translation.en: I'm not doing this right now.
translation.ja: やめて

translation.en: Fine, we'll come by Saturday and we'll talk.
translation.ja: 土曜に僕らと話そう

translation.en: We?
translation.ja: 僕ら？

translation.en: I meant I'll come by.
translation.ja: とにかく話そう

translation.en: Great.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: - Abby! - Jess.
translation.ja: アビー　アビー　アビー！ ごめん

translation.en: - Is that Wes? Why is Wes there? - You know what?
translation.ja: 今のウェス？ なんで？ 今夜―

translation.en: The girls and I are going to come tonight.
translation.ja: そっちに行く

translation.en: But we can only stay until Sunday.
translation.ja: でも日曜までよ

translation.en: That's perfect. Thank you so much. Okay, I'll call Gran and let her know you're coming.
translation.ja: ありがと！ おばあちゃんに伝えとく

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: もしもし？

translation.en: Call Serina, have her pack the girls and see if you can get us on the four o'clock flight to Baltimore.
translation.ja: ボルティモア行きの チケットを手配して

translation.en: Gentlemen, thank you for waiting.
translation.ja: お待たせしました

translation.en: Hey, can you hand me some more nails?
translation.ja: 釘を取ってくれ

translation.en: Lot of help you are.
translation.ja: 助かるよ

translation.en: Don't look at me like that.
translation.ja: 見るなよ

translation.en: I know what I'm doing.
translation.ja: 分かってる

translation.en: - Okay, thanks. I'll get back to you. - All right, bye.
translation.ja: また連絡するわ はい

translation.en: Why didn't Serina come with us?
translation.ja: セリーナは来ないの？

translation.en: We're only here for the weekend, and we're going to have so much fun. Gran is really excited to see you.
translation.ja: 週末だけだし ネルおばあちゃんが待ってる

translation.en: She said she'd get our ears pierced tomorrow.
translation.ja: ピアスを開けていい？

translation.en: No, I said we would talk about it.
translation.ja: ダメよ

translation.en: - You promised. - I promised we would talk about it.
translation.ja: 約束した 話し合う約束よ

translation.en: There is Grandma Nell.
translation.ja: ネルおばあちゃんよ

translation.en: Abby! Hi!
translation.ja: アビー　おかえり

translation.en: Go see Gran.
translation.ja: あいさつして

translation.en: Oh, there are my girls. Oh, you're home.
translation.ja: 待ってたわ かわいいひ孫たち

translation.en: - Hi, Grandma. - Hi, Grandma.
translation.ja: ネルおばあちゃん！

translation.en: Look at you, girls. You're growing like weeds. Look at you.
translation.ja: まあ！ 随分 大きくなったわね

translation.en: You have the spitting image of your mother when she was your age.
translation.ja: ママの子供の頃にそっくりよ

translation.en: Oh, Gran. Hi, I missed you.
translation.ja: おばあちゃん 会いたかったわ

translation.en: - Where's Dad? - Oh, he's in Boston.
translation.ja: パパは？ ボストンよ

translation.en: He's building a retirement community for people over 55.
translation.ja: 55歳以上の 退職者向け施設を造ってる

translation.en: Who retires at 55?
translation.ja: 誰が55歳で引退する？

translation.en: Dinner's ready, and I have all your favorites.
translation.ja: 夕食はあなたの好物ばかりよ

translation.en: - My biscuits. - I'm doing a juice thing.
translation.ja: 夕食はあなたの好物ばかりよ ジュースを飲んでる

translation.en: Oh, I'll make note of that.
translation.ja: メモしておくわ

translation.en: Abby's home!
translation.ja: アビー　おかえり！

translation.en: - Jess! - Jess!
translation.ja: ジェス！

translation.en: Hi, Jess.
translation.ja: 久しぶり

translation.en: Hi.
translation.ja: おかえり

translation.en: All right, I'm here. What is the big secret? What's going on?
translation.ja: 来たわよ 一体 何があったの？

translation.en: Uh, I can't tell you. I have to show you.
translation.ja: 話せない　見せるわ

translation.en: - Jess? - Can I please have two minutes to say hello to my beautiful nieces before you start grilling me?
translation.ja: まずは姪っ子たちと 話をさせてよ

translation.en: Oh my God, you guys are so big.
translation.ja: 大きくなったね

translation.en: I'm obsessed with your hair. Are these highlights?
translation.ja: ステキ　染めてるの？

translation.en: Highlights? She's nine.
translation.ja: まさか！ ９歳よ

translation.en: - Yeah, nine isn't nine anymore. - What does that mean?
translation.ja: 考えが古いね 何て？

translation.en: Okay, come inside. Tell me everything. Let's go.
translation.ja: 中に入りましょ

translation.en: - I am so happy to see you. - Come on. What do you want to do first?
translation.ja: 持つわ 大丈夫よ

translation.en: No, I will take it.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ

translation.en: Okay. I put you in your old room and I put the girls in Jess's room.
translation.ja: 子供たちの荷物は ジェスの部屋に

translation.en: Jess's room? Why isn't Jess in Jess's room?
translation.ja: ジェスはどこに？

translation.en: Wait, she didn't tell you?
translation.ja: 何も聞いてないの？

translation.en: Tell me what? What am I doing here? What's going on?
translation.ja: 説明してよ

translation.en: Well, it's not my place to say, and it's not your responsibility to fix it.
translation.ja: 本人に聞いて あの子が自分で解決すべきよ

translation.en: - Well, if that's... - You've been rescuing that girl since the day that your mother left.
translation.ja: あなたは母親代わりに 十分 面倒を見てきた

translation.en: You two, sit right over here by me. You, here, and you're in this spot.
translation.ja: ２人は私の隣に座って こことそっちね

translation.en: - Okay, tell me everything. How's school? - It's summer.
translation.ja: 教えて　学校はどう？ 夏休みよ

translation.en: Oh, right. Wait till you grow up and you realize
translation.ja: そっか！ 大人に夏休みはないの

translation.en: you don't get summers off anymore. It's a rude awakening.
translation.ja: そっか！ 大人に夏休みはないの 最悪

translation.en: We're supposed to get our ears pierced tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日 ピアスを開けるの

translation.en: - I can totally do that for you. - Uh, that is not going to happen.
translation.ja: やってあげる そうはいかないわ

translation.en: Well, I wasn't going to freeze their earlobes with an ice cube and use one of Gran's needles.
translation.ja: 針で耳たぶに 穴を開けたりしない

translation.en: I meant, I would take them to Vera's Jewelers tomorrow.
translation.ja: 宝石店に連れていく

translation.en: Oh, hey, have you heard from Bree? I've sent her three messages.
translation.ja: ブリーから メールの返事がこない

translation.en: She never calls me back, either. But you know how she gets when she's working on a new play.
translation.ja: 私にもこない 新しい脚本を書いてるのよ

translation.en: Oh, I got an e- mail from Kevin. It's four more months, right?
translation.ja: ケビンは あと４か月で戻るの？

translation.en: I won't feel safe until he's home. I hate Afghanistan.
translation.ja: 心配よ アフガニスタンは嫌い

translation.en: You pierced Mommy's ears?
translation.ja: ママにピアスを開けた？

translation.en: What? That would be dangerous and irresponsible.
translation.ja: えっ？ そんなの危ないし無責任よ

translation.en: Can you believe Connor only has one year left of law school?
translation.ja: コナーは来年 ロースクールを卒業

translation.en: Feel free to break the law. We'll have a lawyer in the family.
translation.ja: 悪さしても安心ね

translation.en: - Excuse me. - What?
translation.ja: やめて 何？ 私はクールな叔母なの

translation.en: I'm the cool aunt.
translation.ja: 何？ 私はクールな叔母なの

translation.en: Okay, just kidding.
translation.ja: 冗談よ 悪いことしちゃダメだし―

translation.en: Never break the law and also don't run with scissors,
translation.ja: 冗談よ 悪いことしちゃダメだし― ハサミを持って走っちゃダメ

translation.en: and always write thank you notes.
translation.ja: ハサミを持って走っちゃダメ

translation.en: Nana's fried chicken.
translation.ja: 特製チキンよ

translation.en: Yay!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: Oh, I can't eat any of this.
translation.ja: 私は食べられない

translation.en: - Oh, sorry. It's just a reminder. - To do what?
translation.ja: ごめん　リマインダーよ 何のために？

translation.en: It's an app that I have. It keeps my entire life on schedule. Every minute is accounted for, so I don't miss anything.
translation.ja: 時間をムダにせず 予定通りに行動するため

translation.en: Seems to me that if you have to be reminded not to miss something,
translation.ja: 忘れないよう リマインダーに頼るうち―

translation.en: you might be missing everything.
translation.ja: すべてを見逃しそう

translation.en: Jess.
translation.ja: ジェス？

translation.en: Lord, bless this food set before us.
translation.ja: 主よ この食事を祝福してください

translation.en: Let this meal nurture our beautiful children,
translation.ja: 子供たちの糧に なりますように

translation.en: and we thank you for having us here together as a family,
translation.ja: 家族が集まれたことに 感謝します

translation.en: and please, watch over the ones that are not here with us now.
translation.ja: 今ここにいない者も お見守りください

translation.en: - Amen. - Amen.
translation.ja: アーメン

translation.en: Yum, thank you.
translation.ja: おいしそう

translation.en: - Abby, your favorite biscuits. - Thanks, Gran.
translation.ja: 好物のビスケットよ ありがとう

translation.en: - Thank you. - You're welcome.
translation.ja: ありがと いい子ね

translation.en: Where are we going? I've had a very long day.
translation.ja: どこへ？ 疲れてるの

translation.en: There it is.
translation.ja: ここよ

translation.en: The Cramers' house?
translation.ja: ここが何？

translation.en: I bought it, and I live here.
translation.ja: 買って住んでる

translation.en: You bought the Cramers' house? Why?
translation.ja: なぜ買ったの？

translation.en: You know how you're always telling me to find something to commit to?
translation.ja: 全力を注げることを探せと 言ったよね？

translation.en: Something to make my own? A passion project?
translation.ja: 情熱を持てることを

translation.en: I was talking about grad school.
translation.ja: 大学院のことよ

translation.en: I bought it, and I've been fixing it up, and I'm turning it into a bed- and- breakfast.
translation.ja: ここを修理して Ｂ＆Ｂにするの

translation.en: I got a small business loan from the bank--
translation.ja: 資金の融資も…

translation.en: Jess. What do you know about running a hotel?
translation.ja: ホテルの経営なんて無理よ

translation.en: It's not a hotel. It's a bed- and- breakfast.
translation.ja: ホテルじゃなくてＢ＆Ｂ

translation.en: And it's not that hard. It's like having sleepovers that pay you.
translation.ja: ベッドと朝食だけだから 簡単よ

translation.en: It's beautiful, right? I mean, you would totally stay here, wouldn't you?
translation.ja: ステキでしょ 泊まりたくなったはず

translation.en: Yeah. It's really cute. I'm...
translation.ja: そうね　とってもステキ

translation.en: Jess, the stained glass, the furniture, it must've cost you a fortune.
translation.ja: 装飾や家具に お金がかかったはず

translation.en: It's an investment. You got to spend money to make money, Steve Jobs said that.
translation.ja: ジョブズは“金は 使わないと稼げない”と

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.ja: 何これ！

translation.en: I knew you were going to freak out,
translation.ja: ビックリしたと思うけど―

translation.en: but it's not as bad as it looks.
translation.ja: 平気よ

translation.en: It's exactly as bad as it looks.
translation.ja: 相当ひどいわ

translation.en: Well, I didn't know I was going to have to pay for new pipes. That was not my fault.
translation.ja: 配管の交換なんて 知らなかった

translation.en: That was an unforeseen business expense.
translation.ja: “予期せぬ経費の発生”

translation.en: Again, Steve Jobs.
translation.ja: ジョブズの言葉

translation.en: Okay, this is where I need you. I need help with the bank.
translation.ja: 銀行との交渉に力を貸して

translation.en: They're threatening to foreclose on my loan because I missed a couple payments, and--
translation.ja: 何度か支払いが滞って 銀行が抵当権の行使を…

translation.en: Okay, Jess. This is Chesapeake Shores. Just have Dad talk to Mr. Riley at the bank--
translation.ja: パパからライリーさんに 頼んでもらえば？

translation.en: No, I don't want Dad's help. I'm doing this on my own.
translation.ja: パパには頼らず自力でやる

translation.en: I just need you to help me talk to the bank about getting an extension on my loan or something.
translation.ja: 銀行に返済猶予の 交渉をするから口添えして

translation.en: - Okay. - Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Okay, call Mr. Riley in the morning and have him meet us at the bank.
translation.ja: ライリーさんに 銀行に行くと伝えておいて

translation.en: - I don't know what I can do though. - Okay, this is everything you'll need.
translation.ja: 期待はしないで 必要な書類は揃ってる

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.ja: 本当にありがとう

translation.en: You're the best sister in the world.
translation.ja: 最高の姉さんよ

translation.en: - It'll be okay. - Okay.
translation.ja: きっと大丈夫

translation.en: Let's go get ice cream.
translation.ja: アイスを食べよう

translation.en: No, I do not eat ice cream. I mean...
translation.ja: アイスは食べない

translation.en: Yes, you do. Come on.
translation.ja: 食べようよ　行こう

translation.en: Fine.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Did you wait up for me? Gran, I'm 34 years old.
translation.ja: 寝ないで待ってたの？ 私は34歳よ

translation.en: Abby, darling, I always wait up until everyone's home in bed.
translation.ja: 皆が帰ってくるまで 寝ずに待ってるわ

translation.en: Well, it's a good thing you don't know what happened
translation.ja: 昔は おばあちゃんが 眠った後―

translation.en: after you went to bed when we were young.
translation.ja: 私が何してたと思う？

translation.en: What's the statute of limitations on being grounded?
translation.ja: もう時効よね

translation.en: When you used to sneak out the second- story window
translation.ja: ２階の窓から抜け出し―

translation.en: and shimmy down the lattice work after I'd gone to bed?
translation.ja: フェンス伝いに 下りてたこと？

translation.en: You knew?
translation.ja: 知ってた？

translation.en: Did you ever wonder why I had the lattice reinforced?
translation.ja: だからフェンスを補強した

translation.en: You were the oldest, and you were a good girl.
translation.ja: あなたは長女でいい子だった

translation.en: I could give you a little space.
translation.ja: 大目に見たの

translation.en: Well, thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Do you think you're going to be able to help Jess?
translation.ja: ジェスの力になれる？

translation.en: Oh, yes. I just need to go over her books and see what kind of shape they're in.
translation.ja: ええ　まずは 帳簿を確認してみる

translation.en: She says that she just needs help extending her loan, but you know Jess.
translation.ja: 返済期限の延期だけと 言うけど どうだか

translation.en: Wes called while you were out.
translation.ja: ウェスから電話が

translation.en: I'm avoiding him.
translation.ja: 彼を避けてるの

translation.en: I think he's going to tell me that he is getting remarried.
translation.ja: 彼 再婚するつもり なんだと思う

translation.en: Oh, Abby. I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: まあ アビー　残念ね

translation.en: It's just the girls I'm worried about. It's a lot of change for them.
translation.ja: 娘たちが動揺しないか心配

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: - I love you. - Thanks, Gran.
translation.ja: 愛してるわ ありがとう

translation.en: Jess.
translation.ja: あきれた

translation.en: You have 26 unheard messages.
translation.ja: メッセージは26件です

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.ja: うるさい

translation.en: Oh, Franny's Flower Shop closed?
translation.ja: フラニーの店は なくなったの？

translation.en: Yeah, Bert and Franny moved to Florida after Candy had their fifth grandchild.
translation.ja: ５人目の孫ができて 引っ越した

translation.en: Candy has five children? Wow, she's younger than I am.
translation.ja: すごいわね 娘さんは私より年下よ

translation.en: Someone you never expected to see again is back working here.
translation.ja: 懐かしい人が銀行にいるよ

translation.en: - Who? - It's a surprise.
translation.ja: 誰？ お楽しみ

translation.en: - Abby. - Hi, Mariah.
translation.ja: アビー！ マライア

translation.en: - It's been a long time. - Yeah, how are you?
translation.ja: 久しぶりね 元気？

translation.en: - Great. - We need to see Mr. Riley.
translation.ja: ええ ライリーさんは？

translation.en: I think he's in his office. I'll just buzz.
translation.ja: オフィスよ　呼ぶわ

translation.en: I know where to go.
translation.ja: 大丈夫

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: ありがと

translation.en: Abby O'Brien. Back in Chesapeake Shores.
translation.ja: アビー･オブライエン 町に戻ったのか？

translation.en: It's been a long time.
translation.ja: 久しぶりだな

translation.en: Yeah. It's good to see you again, Trace.
translation.ja: 会えてうれしいわ トレイス

translation.en: You... You look great.
translation.ja: 君は… 元気そうだ

translation.en: Hey, Jess.
translation.ja: ジェス

translation.en: - Hey. - I got your call.
translation.ja: 電話をどうも

translation.en: - Oh, yeah. - Of course, you know why we're here, so can we just get straight to it?
translation.ja: じゃあ本題に入るわ

translation.en: We understand there have been some fiscal oversights, we're prepared to offer the bank assurance that Jess--
translation.ja: 不注意で 返済が遅延したけど…

translation.en: - Actually, Trace-- - Could you just
translation.ja: トレイスは…

translation.en: let me handle this? Thanks.
translation.ja: 私に任せて

translation.en: However, this is also about the egregious interest- only mortgage that never should've been offered to Jess in the first place.
translation.ja: そもそも元本が減らない 悪質なローンよ

translation.en: Egregious? That doesn't sound very friendly now, does it?
translation.ja: 悪質？ ここは “親しみやすい銀行”だぞ

translation.en: I mean, this is the friendly bank.
translation.ja: ここは “親しみやすい銀行”だぞ

translation.en: Well, my sister came to you in good faith and I think
translation.ja: 誠意を見せた妹に 機会を与えるのが…

translation.en: - she deserves an opportunity to-- - Jess's file is right here.
translation.ja: 誠意を見せた妹に 機会を与えるのが… ジェスの書類だ 見てみよう

translation.en: Why don't we take a look?
translation.ja: ジェスの書類だ 見てみよう

translation.en: It appears the bank has already initiated foreclosure proceedings on the property.
translation.ja: 抵当権の実行手続きは 既に始まってる

translation.en: That's what happens when people don't keep their word.
translation.ja: 約束を守らないからだ

translation.en: - Don't make this about you and me. - You and me?
translation.ja: 私への当てつけ？ 当てつけ？

translation.en: - There's a you and me? - You know what I mean.
translation.ja: どうして？ とぼけないで仕事に徹して

translation.en: This is business. It's not personal.
translation.ja: とぼけないで仕事に徹して

translation.en: You can't punish Jess for something I did.
translation.ja: 妹は関係ない

translation.en: Is that what I am doing?
translation.ja: 君への恨みを ジェスで晴らしてると？

translation.en: Because that would be totally egregious.
translation.ja: 君への恨みを ジェスで晴らしてると？ それは悪質だ

translation.en: You know what? Jess has a new investment partner.
translation.ja: ジェスには 新しい投資パートナーが

translation.en: I do?
translation.ja: いたっけ？

translation.en: I totally do.
translation.ja: いたね

translation.en: Yes and she has more than enough cash flow to pay back the bank loans
translation.ja: ローンを返済する 十分な資金があり―

translation.en: and to capitalize the running of the bed- and- breakfast
translation.ja: 最低１年間の Ｂ＆Ｂ運営費も…

translation.en: for at least the next year or so--
translation.ja: 最低１年間の Ｂ＆Ｂ運営費も… アビー

translation.en: - Abby I-- - Could you please...
translation.ja: 黙ってて

translation.en: Okay, I'll be anywhere else.
translation.ja: じゃあ私は席を外すね

translation.en: Sounds like you really know your stuff. You must've learned a lot on Wall Street.
translation.ja: 抜かりないな ウォール街仕込み？

translation.en: You made the right decision fleeing to New York.
translation.ja: ＮＹに逃げて正解だ

translation.en: I didn't flee. I moved.
translation.ja: 引っ越したの

translation.en: It's not moving when you leave without saying goodbye to your fiancé.
translation.ja: 婚約者に別れも告げずに？

translation.en: We weren't engaged. Okay, we talked about it. Yes, obviously, but we were children,
translation.ja: 正式には婚約してなかった 私たちは子供だったの

translation.en: and if I hadn't left when I did, I might've never left.
translation.ja: あの時を逃せば 一生 出られなかったかも

translation.en: We were supposed to leave together.
translation.ja: 俺を置き去りに

translation.en: I know, but--
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: But you figured when it came down to it, I wouldn't go.
translation.ja: 俺は行かないと 思ったんだろ？

translation.en: - Okay, it wasn't just that-- - And even if I did,
translation.ja: そうじゃない 一緒に町を出ても 俺は音楽で失敗し―

translation.en: I would fail in the real world with my music,
translation.ja: 一緒に町を出ても 俺は音楽で失敗し―

translation.en: and end up right back here working for my father at his bank.
translation.ja: 父の銀行で働くようになると

translation.en: You couldn't tie your string to that kite.
translation.ja: 君はそんな男と 付き合えなかった

translation.en: It wasn't just that. I mean, not...
translation.ja: そうじゃない

translation.en: completely.
translation.ja: 違うの

translation.en: It was really good seeing you, Abby.
translation.ja: また会えてよかった

translation.en: You knew, and you did not stop me.
translation.ja: 先に言ってよ

translation.en: I tried to, but you were being so bossy.
translation.ja: 耳を貸さなかったくせに

translation.en: You told me that there was someone I'd be very surprised to see working back at the bank.
translation.ja: “懐かしい人が銀行にいる” と言うから…

translation.en: Yeah, I meant Mr. Binkow.
translation.ja: ビンコウさんのことよ

translation.en: - I thought he died. - So did I.
translation.ja: 亡くなったかと 私もそう思ってた 驚いた？

translation.en: Surprise.
translation.ja: 私もそう思ってた 驚いた？

translation.en: And Trace?
translation.ja: トレイスは？

translation.en: He's been back for about six months. I'm not sure what's going on with him. He doesn't work at the bank.
translation.ja: 半年前に戻ったけど 銀行では働いてない

translation.en: Yes, I got that. Thank you.
translation.ja: ええ　そうみたいね

translation.en: It would've been really nice to know before I made a complete fool of myself.
translation.ja: 聞いてないから 大恥かいたわ

translation.en: I didn't know he was here. He was probably visiting his dad.
translation.ja: 来てると思わなかった

translation.en: I'm mortified, so...
translation.ja: 恥ずかしい

translation.en: Well, you should be.
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: He's been helping me rebuild the floors. We owe him a lot of money.
translation.ja: 彼に床の修理を頼んで お金も借りた

translation.en: I need to clear my head, so I'm going to walk home alone.
translation.ja: 気持ちを整理するために 歩いて帰る

translation.en: I love you!
translation.ja: 大好きよ！

translation.en: Abby, welcome home!
translation.ja: アビー！ おかえり

translation.en: Hi, Sally. Can I get a cup of mint tea, please?
translation.ja: サリー ミントティーをお願い

translation.en: Sure. Lunch is ready.
translation.ja: いいわよ ランチもできてる

translation.en: - Lunch? - Well, I figured you'd be hungry,
translation.ja: ランチ？ 空腹でしょ？ ジョギングして 銀行で交渉

translation.en: after running this morning and going to the bank with Jess.
translation.ja: 空腹でしょ？ ジョギングして 銀行で交渉

translation.en: How do you know that?
translation.ja: なぜそれを？

translation.en: Donna Martin saw you running on the shore this morning, and then Mariah called and said you were at the bank.
translation.ja: ドナが海岸で見かけて マライアは電話をくれた

translation.en: Right, I forgot about being in a small town, but I actually don't eat this way anymore.
translation.ja: 筒抜けね でもランチは食べない

translation.en: I know, Nell told me.
translation.ja: ネルに聞いてる

translation.en: Double hickory burger and curly fries, our favorite.
translation.ja: ダブル薫製バーガーか 好物だ

translation.en: Oh, my gosh!
translation.ja: ウソ！ ボストンじゃなかったの？

translation.en: - I thought you were out of town. - I am. I was.
translation.ja: ウソ！ ボストンじゃなかったの？ そうだが―

translation.en: Gran called and told me you and the girls were coming home, so I jumped on a plane.
translation.ja: お前たちが来ると聞き 飛んで帰った

translation.en: Well, it was a very last- minute decision.
translation.ja: 直前に決めたの

translation.en: You know what? I'll tell you what.
translation.ja: ジェスなんだろ？

translation.en: I know Jess shouldn't have dragged you into her mess.
translation.ja: お前に泣きつくとは

translation.en: I'll call Sam Riley tomorrow and have her loan extended.
translation.ja: 俺が銀行に話をつける

translation.en: Actually, she wants to do this on her own. She doesn't want your help.
translation.ja: 自分の力で 解決したいみたい

translation.en: And yet, here you are.
translation.ja: だが お前を呼んだ

translation.en: - Hey, Sal. - Hey.
translation.ja: やあ　サリー

translation.en: You know, I... I think she just wants to prove to you that...
translation.ja: ジェスは パパに証明したいのよ

translation.en: I don't know. She just wants you to be proud of her.
translation.ja: 認められたいの

translation.en: I'm proud of all of my children.
translation.ja: 皆 自慢の子供だ

translation.en: Well, she doesn't seem to know that, so...
translation.ja: あの子はそう思ってない

translation.en: - Well... - I mean, she was so young when Mom left, and you were always busy working and...
translation.ja: ママが出ていった時 まだ幼くて…

translation.en: Hey, Mick, good to see you.
translation.ja: ミック！ よかった

translation.en: Hey. Good to see you, Dan. - Hey, Henry. What's going on? - Hi.
translation.ja: どうかしたのか？

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you about the old church.
translation.ja: 古い教会の件だ

translation.en: Some people have approached the historical committee about you tearing it down.
translation.ja: 君が解体し 商業施設にする噂が―

translation.en: The rumor is you plan on turning it into commercial--
translation.ja: 歴史委員会に届き…

translation.en: Henry, please don't listen to rumors, okay? They're like wildfires.
translation.ja: 耳を貸すな 噂話は山火事と同じ

translation.en: Someone lights a spark, it spreads slowly, burns fast and causes all sorts of damage.
translation.ja: 火は徐々に広がり 急速に燃えて損害を与える

translation.en: - Okay, fair enough-- - My family built this town.
translation.ja: 確かに… 俺の先祖が築いた町だ 守りたい

translation.en: And no one wants to protect the shore more than we do.
translation.ja: 俺の先祖が築いた町だ 守りたい

translation.en: Your brother is concerned.
translation.ja: 弟さんが心配を

translation.en: My brother thinks we have to keep all the original parts in order to preserve history.
translation.ja: 歴史を守るには 原形のまま保存しろと？

translation.en: Now, if that were true, you wouldn't have that new hip, would you?
translation.ja: 君だって 腰の手術をしてるだろ？

translation.en: - Okay, I get that-- - We're talking about renovation here.
translation.ja: ああ 町を リノベーションするだけだ

translation.en: Nothing more.
translation.ja: 町を リノベーションするだけだ

translation.en: That church has to be propped up, or it's going to fall down.
translation.ja: 教会は 補強しないと倒壊するし―

translation.en: And don't forget, I'm the one who formed the historical committee - to protect the shore. - Yes.
translation.ja: 歴史委員会は 俺が立ち上げた

translation.en: - Yes, you did. - Okay.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: I told you there's nothing to worry about.
translation.ja: 杞憂だっただろ？

translation.en: - Good to see you, Mick. - See you.
translation.ja: じゃあな

translation.en: Face- to- face and look them in the eye. That's how honest business gets done.
translation.ja: 相手と向き合うのが 誠実な仕事だ

translation.en: E- mailing gives you half the story.
translation.ja: メールじゃいかん

translation.en: So, you are renovating the old church?
translation.ja: 教会を修繕するの？

translation.en: Well, just looking into it. Early stages.
translation.ja: まだ検討中だよ

translation.en: Sally, you know what? I'm not going to have time to eat that. I got to run. Just put that on my tab.
translation.ja: 急いでるんだ ツケにしといてくれ

translation.en: See you at dinner?
translation.ja: 夕食は家で？

translation.en: - I'm getting fresh crabs. - Oh, great.
translation.ja: カニだぞ やった

translation.en: - I'm so glad you're home. - Me, too.
translation.ja: 楽しみだ

translation.en: - Bye, Pops. - Bye, Sal. Bye, honey.
translation.ja: 私もよ　後でね じゃあな

translation.en: Bye.
translation.ja: さよなら

translation.en: So, how was it seeing Trace after all these years?
translation.ja: 久々に トレイスに会った感想は？

translation.en: Mariah said he was at the bank.
translation.ja: マライアに聞いた

translation.en: His mom says he's been doing pretty well with his band.
translation.ja: 彼の母親によると バンドは順調だったみたい

translation.en: They travel all over Nashville. Bars, clubs, stuff like that.
translation.ja: 彼の母親によると バンドは順調だったみたい バーやクラブで演奏して―

translation.en: You know he had a song on the radio a while back?
translation.ja: ラジオでも曲が流れた

translation.en: Yeah, I heard that.
translation.ja: ええ　聞いたわ

translation.en: So I wonder why he's back.
translation.ja: なのに戻ってきた

translation.en: I mean, something must have happened, right?
translation.ja: 何かあったはず

translation.en: I have no idea.
translation.ja: どうかしら

translation.en: Everyone always thought you two would end up together.
translation.ja: ヨリを戻さないの？

translation.en: Right. None of my business.
translation.ja: 余計なお世話ね

translation.en: Hi, Millie. I need you to clear my Monday. I have some business to take care of here, but I'll be in the office on Tuesday.
translation.ja: 月曜の予定はキャンセルして 用ができたの

translation.en: Gabrielle called a partner meeting for Monday at noon.
translation.ja: ガブリエルが月曜に会議をと

translation.en: What? Why? Put me through to her.
translation.ja: なぜ？ 彼女につないで

translation.en: Actually, no. Tell her that she needs to reschedule the meeting for when I am back in the office.
translation.ja: やっぱりいいわ 戻るまで延期と伝えて

translation.en: Millie, I'm going to call you back.
translation.ja: かけ直すわ

translation.en: Serina. Thank you for getting back to me.
translation.ja: セリーナ　連絡をありがとう

translation.en: We're going to be here until Monday, and so I...
translation.ja: 月曜までこっちに…

translation.en: What? What's going on?
translation.ja: えっ？ どうして？

translation.en: - Oh, how did things go at the bank? - Oh, it'll be fine.
translation.ja: 銀行の件はどうなった？ 大丈夫よ 私が連帯保証人になることに

translation.en: I'm going to stay until Monday and co- sign on Jess's loan for her.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ 私が連帯保証人になることに

translation.en: Oh, you're such a good sister.
translation.ja: 本当に いいお姉さんね

translation.en: Well, as an added bonus, my nanny just quit.
translation.ja: 子守がついさっき辞めたの

translation.en: The girls love her, and I have no idea how I'm going to replace her.
translation.ja: 後任探しが大変だわ

translation.en: They have you.
translation.ja: 母親がいる

translation.en: I'm a single, working mother and I need someone to be me when I'm not there.
translation.ja: 私は働くシングルマザーよ 子守が必要

translation.en: You're the one who told me that you need to be home for 1,000 hours to be there for the 15 minutes that matter.
translation.ja: 大切な時に誰かが そばにいないと

translation.en: - Oh, Dad's home. - Oh, I know.
translation.ja: パパも戻った 知ってる サリーから連絡が

translation.en: Sally called me.
translation.ja: 知ってる サリーから連絡が

translation.en: Is nothing in this town private?
translation.ja: プライバシーはないの？

translation.en: Privacy is overrated.
translation.ja: プライバシーが そんなに大切？

translation.en: So, Trace is back.
translation.ja: トレイスがいた

translation.en: Oh, I heard.
translation.ja: 戻ったのよ

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me?
translation.ja: なぜ黙ってたの？

translation.en: I don't like to gossip.
translation.ja: 噂話は嫌い

translation.en: This is a blessing.
translation.ja: 幸せなことね

translation.en: I haven't seen this many O'Briens at a table in I don't know how long.
translation.ja: こんなに家族が揃うのは 久しぶりだわ

translation.en: What I wouldn't give to have the whole family here for the Fourth of July.
translation.ja: 独立記念日には勢揃いだ

translation.en: Well, we have to get back, actually. We can't stay that long.
translation.ja: そんなにいられない

translation.en: I have so much work to do, and the girls... They start summer school on Monday.
translation.ja: 子供たちは月曜から サマースクールが始まる

translation.en: No, we don't. We still have two more weeks.
translation.ja: まだ２週間あるよ

translation.en: Oh, that's right. You have ballet.
translation.ja: バレエもある

translation.en: We're not doing ballet anymore. We're doing tap.
translation.ja: 今はタップダンス

translation.en: Well, we don't have your tap shoes yet.
translation.ja: 靴を買わないと

translation.en: Yes, we do. Serina took us.
translation.ja: もう買った

translation.en: Okay, well, what about your ballet recital?
translation.ja: バレエの発表会は ネズミの役？

translation.en: You guys were going to be mice. I was so excited to see that.
translation.ja: バレエの発表会は ネズミの役？ 楽しみだわ

translation.en: We already did it. You were in Chicago. Daddy and Gabrielle came.
translation.ja: もう終わった パパとガブリエルが見に来た

translation.en: No, I have it in my calendar. It is next week... And...
translation.ja: 私のスケジュール表には 来週末だと書いて…

translation.en: How are things at the inn?
translation.ja: ホテルの方は？

translation.en: It's not an inn, it's a bed- and- breakfast, and everything's good.
translation.ja: Ｂ＆Ｂよ　すべて順調だわ

translation.en: Should be open by September or October.
translation.ja: ９月か10月に開業する

translation.en: Well, that's wonderful. If you need any help, I'd love to--
translation.ja: そうか 助けが必要なら…

translation.en: - I have everything under control. - I'm sure you do.
translation.ja: 必要ない 俺は地元の業者と…

translation.en: Just saying I've got local contractors--
translation.ja: 俺は地元の業者と… 大丈夫よ

translation.en: I'm good, thanks.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ

translation.en: You know, I never allowed phone calls at the table when you were kids.
translation.ja: 食事の席では携帯を禁じてた

translation.en: That's because cell phones didn't exist when we were growing up.
translation.ja: 昔は携帯がなかった

translation.en: Well, that's semantics.
translation.ja: 屁理屈だ

translation.en: It's just my assistant. I'll call her back.
translation.ja: アシスタントよ

translation.en: Your assistant works on Saturday? That's a commitment.
translation.ja: 土曜も仕事か？ 熱心だな

translation.en: It's Saturday?
translation.ja: 今日って土曜？

translation.en: - What's wrong? - Oh, nothing, sweetie.
translation.ja: どうしたの？ 何でもないわ

translation.en: I'm sorry. I need to make a phone call. I'll be right back.
translation.ja: ごめん　電話をかけなきゃ すぐ戻る

translation.en: Do you have any queens?
translation.ja: クイーンは？

translation.en: That's good.
translation.ja: いいわね

translation.en: So, what was that phone call about?
translation.ja: 誰に電話を？

translation.en: I had a date tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 デートの約束が

translation.en: It's a friend of mine. Set me up with his tax attorney, and he's really cute and tall and successful,
translation.ja: 友人の紹介よ やり手の税理士でイケメン

translation.en: and I've canceled on him three times.
translation.ja: ３回 キャンセルして―

translation.en: I told him I would absolutely be there tonight.
translation.ja: “今夜は必ず行く”と

translation.en: You've canceled on him three times? - I don't think you wanted to go. - Do you have any eights?
translation.ja: ３回も断るのは 乗り気じゃない証拠よ

translation.en: No, I do. I just forgot.
translation.ja: 違う　忘れてただけ

translation.en: What was the name of that floppy old bunny that you used to carry around with you
translation.ja: ２歳頃に持ち歩いてた 古びたウサギのぬいぐるみ

translation.en: when you were two years old?
translation.ja: 名前は何だったかしら？

translation.en: - Fluffy Nunny. - Fluffy Nunny.
translation.ja: “ふわふわウサちゃん”

translation.en: You never forget the stuff you care about.
translation.ja: 大事なことは忘れない

translation.en: Well, I haven't been on a date in over a year, and... I've forgotten how to flirt.
translation.ja: １年以上デートしてなくて 恋愛の仕方を忘れたわ

translation.en: My really cute neighbor winked at me the other day, and I gave him the number for my eye doctor.
translation.ja: 前は口説かれて 眼科医の番号を教えた

translation.en: Go on some dates. Get back in the game. Join Match or Tinder.
translation.ja: デートしなきゃ 出会い系サイトは？

translation.en: Yeah, I... I buy my shampoo and conditioner in one bottle
translation.ja: 私は時間がなさすぎて―

translation.en: because I don't have time for two steps.
translation.ja: リンスインシャンプーを 使ってる

translation.en: I don't have time to date.
translation.ja: 暇がない

translation.en: Excuse me? You do not go on those dating sites, do you? Because they are dangerous.
translation.ja: 出会い系はダメよ 危ないから

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks, Mom.
translation.ja: 分かってる　ママ

translation.en: Speaking of Mom, how is she?
translation.ja: 本当のママはどうしてる？

translation.en: She is fine, you know.
translation.ja: 元気にしてるわ

translation.en: How can you even have her in your life?
translation.ja: よく付き合えるね

translation.en: Oh, Jess, I'm not having this conversation again with you.
translation.ja: もうその話はやめて

translation.en: She abandoned us, Abby.
translation.ja: 私たちを捨てたのに

translation.en: She didn't abandon us, she moved, and she planned to take us with her,
translation.ja: 連れていこうとしたけど―

translation.en: but Dad convinced her to let us stay here, in our house with our friends and our school.
translation.ja: 学校があるからと パパが止めた

translation.en: Well, let me ask you this. Would you leave Caitlyn and Carrie and move away from them?
translation.ja: キャリーたちを置いて 出ていける？

translation.en: Are there any circumstances under which you would walk out on them?
translation.ja: 子供より大事なものがある？

translation.en: We are all grown up now.
translation.ja: 私たちは大人よ

translation.en: We're not depending on our parents for anything anymore.
translation.ja: もう親に頼らない

translation.en: What age is it when you stop needing a mother and a father?
translation.ja: いつ親が必要なくなる？

translation.en: When does that happen? Because I'm still waiting.
translation.ja: 私は今も待ってる

translation.en: How pathetic does that make me that I'm still waiting for them to come home?
translation.ja: 惨めに親の帰りをね

translation.en: Jess.
translation.ja: ジェス

translation.en: Bye.
translation.ja: じゃあね

translation.en: I thought you were leaving town.
translation.ja: まだ町に？

translation.en: I am. I just have some business to take care of with your dad at the bank,
translation.ja: あなたのお父さんの銀行で 手続きがある

translation.en: where you apparently do not work. I'm really sorry about the other day.
translation.ja: この前は早とちりして ごめんなさい

translation.en: No big deal.
translation.ja: いいさ

translation.en: I'm used to you thinking you know everything.
translation.ja: 昔からそうだ

translation.en: That is not fair.
translation.ja: ひどいわ

translation.en: Hey, Trace, can we just talk about it for a minute?
translation.ja: ねえ 少し話せる？

translation.en: You can try, but I doubt you can keep up.
translation.ja: いいけど ついて来られる？

translation.en: Oh, really? I have been outrunning you since we were, like...
translation.ja: それ本気？ 昔から私の方が速く…

translation.en: Hey!
translation.ja: ちょっと！

translation.en: Trace!
translation.ja: トレイス！

translation.en: You got slow.
translation.ja: 遅くなったな

translation.en: I had two children.
translation.ja: 出産したから

translation.en: Years ago.
translation.ja: 何年も前だろ

translation.en: So, you have a place here now?
translation.ja: 町に戻ったのね？

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Unlike you, I like it here.
translation.ja: 俺はここが好きだ

translation.en: I like it here.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: - Sure you do. - I do.
translation.ja: へえ 本当よ

translation.en: You forget how long I've known you.
translation.ja: 長い付き合いだぞ

translation.en: I like having a house on the water.
translation.ja: 海沿いの家はいい

translation.en: A place where I can just breathe, you know?
translation.ja: 心安らかに過ごせる場所だ

translation.en: Recharge.
translation.ja: 充電できる

translation.en: A house on the water?
translation.ja: 海沿いの家？

translation.en: I bought the beach shack on Spirit Cove.
translation.ja: ビーチハウスを買って―

translation.en: I've been fixing it up.
translation.ja: 修理してる

translation.en: You bought the beach shack?
translation.ja: ビーチハウスを？

translation.en: I always said I would. I mean, that was the plan, right?
translation.ja: そういう計画だっただろ

translation.en: Yes, that was the plan when we were 16 years old.
translation.ja: 16歳の頃に立てた計画よ

translation.en: We were going to run away and live there where no one could find us, or tell us what to do.
translation.ja: 一緒に家を出て 誰にも指図されず生きる

translation.en: It was a good plan.
translation.ja: いい計画だ

translation.en: Yeah, I can't believe my dad sold it to you. He said he was not going to sell it.
translation.ja: パパは絶対に売らないと 言ってた

translation.en: Well, I guess he changed his mind.
translation.ja: 気が変わったのさ

translation.en: He said one thing and did another.
translation.ja: 彼の発言と行動は違う

translation.en: So, how's your music going?
translation.ja: 音楽活動はどう？

translation.en: It's great. Yeah.
translation.ja: かなりいいよ

translation.en: It's really good.
translation.ja: かなりいいよ 絶好調だ

translation.en: So, you're just home to breathe and recharge?
translation.ja: 充電のために帰郷を？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Yeah? You sure there's nothing else going on?
translation.ja: 他に理由はない？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: ない

translation.en: You forget how long I've known you.
translation.ja: 長い付き合いよ

translation.en: - I don't understand. - You don't have to understand.
translation.ja: 分かんない 考えなくていい

translation.en: Just look at the clouds and see the pictures.
translation.ja: ただ雲を見て想像するの

translation.en: I just see clouds.
translation.ja: 雲は雲だよ

translation.en: Close your eyes now. Let's imagine, let's pretend.
translation.ja: 目を閉じて想像してみて

translation.en: Imagine that you're in a fairy tale in the sky.
translation.ja: 今 おとぎ話みたいに 空に浮かんでる

translation.en: Now, open your eyes!
translation.ja: 目を開けて

translation.en: I see an elephant.
translation.ja: ゾウが見える

translation.en: I see a girl in a tutu dancing on a horse.
translation.ja: 女の子が 馬に乗って踊ってる

translation.en: No, on a unicorn.
translation.ja: 違う　ユニコーンよ

translation.en: - Which one of us is right? - You both are.
translation.ja: どっちが正解？ どっちもよ

translation.en: You can't get that in New York City.
translation.ja: ＮＹでは無理だろ

translation.en: Hey. You sold Trace the beach house.
translation.ja: トレイスに ビーチハウスを売ったの？

translation.en: Yeah, he bought it six years ago.
translation.ja: ああ　６年前にな

translation.en: He's been asking if he could buy it since he was 18, and I finally gave in.
translation.ja: 彼が18の頃から 頼まれてたから― ついに認めてね

translation.en: He's been fixing it up over the years. It needs a lot of work.
translation.ja: 修理中だよ

translation.en: You built that with your brothers. You said you would never sell it.
translation.ja: 売らないはずでは？

translation.en: I know, but he had the money, and he was very persistent,
translation.ja: 彼には金があって 強情だし―

translation.en: and he said something to me that made me change my mind about selling it.
translation.ja: 彼の言葉に心を動かされた

translation.en: Which was?
translation.ja: 彼は何て？

translation.en: He said it reminded him of the best time in his life.
translation.ja: “人生最良の時を思い出す”

translation.en: Whatever that means.
translation.ja: そう言ってた

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: こんにちは

translation.en: This place is amazing. It's so much different than when we were kids.
translation.ja: 昔と比べると見違えるほど 変わったわね

translation.en: Isn't that the truth?
translation.ja: そうだろ？

translation.en: Now it has a front door, and I have the keys.
translation.ja: 今は玄関のドアもあるし 鍵もある

translation.en: - Is he yours? - Axel?
translation.ja: あなたの犬？ アクセルか？ もう10年ほど一緒だ

translation.en: Yeah, he's been with me for like ten years.
translation.ja: アクセルか？ もう10年ほど一緒だ

translation.en: Come here, Axel. Hey, boy.
translation.ja: おいで　いい子だ

translation.en: That's longer than I was married.
translation.ja: 私の結婚より長い

translation.en: I heard.
translation.ja: 聞いたよ

translation.en: You know, I never liked Wes.
translation.ja: ウェスは嫌いだった

translation.en: - You never met him. - Didn't need to.
translation.ja: 面識ないのに？ 必要ない

translation.en: This deck is beautiful.
translation.ja: ステキなデッキね

translation.en: Your grandfather would be so proud of you.
translation.ja: おじい様が喜ぶ

translation.en: Carpentry is a valuable skill. Learn a trade. Keep it in your back pocket.
translation.ja: “大工仕事は役に立つ 覚えて損はない”

translation.en: He was right.
translation.ja: その通りだ

translation.en: You know, I built all my own furniture back in Nashville.
translation.ja: 家具は全部 手作りしてた

translation.en: That's amazing.
translation.ja: すごいわ

translation.en: Well, I mean, you always loved working with your hands, so...
translation.ja: 昔から手作りが好きよね

translation.en: My grandfather always got me in a way my father never could.
translation.ja: 祖父は父よりも 俺を理解してた

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: Do you remember that wooden box you made me in shop class?
translation.ja: あなたは木箱を作ってくれた

translation.en: It was the first thing I ever made.
translation.ja: 初めての作品だ

translation.en: I remember I burned our initials on the top.
translation.ja: 俺たちのイニシャル入り

translation.en: Look.
translation.ja: ねえ

translation.en: I know you've been helping Jess with the floors, and we owe you a lot of money, so I can...
translation.ja: 床の修理費と ジェスが借りてるお金の―

translation.en: - I can write you a check. - Jess and I will work it out.
translation.ja: 小切手を… 君には関係ない

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: Well, I'm going back to New York tonight, so I just want to make sure there's no unfinished business.
translation.ja: 今夜 発つけど やり残したことはない？

translation.en: Don't worry, Abby. There's no unfinished business here.
translation.ja: 心配するな やり残したことはない

translation.en: You travel safe.
translation.ja: 気をつけて
